15.6: The School of Hillel said: One may take bones and peels off the table. The School of Shammai said: One moves the entire table and shakes it. Zekharia ben Avkulos did not comply with either the School of Shammai nor the School of Hillel. Rather, he would take [the refuse] as he ate and throw it behind the couch. Rabbi Yosi said: The humility of Rabbi Zekharia ben Avkulos is what burned the sanctuary [of the Temple]
